means: 孟德尔(Gregor Johann,1822-1884，奥地利遗传学家)

sentence.Network_en: In 1857 Mendel started experimenting with peas in his monastery garden.
sentence.Network_cn: 1857年，孟德尔开始在修道院的菜园里用豌豆做实验。
孟德尔尝试了杂交育种。

sentence.Network_en: Mendel called the second generation the hybrid generation.

means.word_mean: 1. Augustinian monk and botanist whose experiments in breeding garden peas led to his eventual recognition as founder of the science of genetics (1822-1884)
